easy.description: Three vertical stripes: blue, white, and red.
White background with a red circle in the center.
Three vertical stripes: green, white, and red.
Thirteen red and white stripes with a blue rectangle and white stars in the top-left corner.
A blue field with a red and white combined cross pattern known as the Union Jack.
Three horizontal stripes: black on top, red in the middle, and gold on the bottom.
Green on the hoist side and red on the fly side with a complex coat of arms on the border between the colors.
A red square flag with a bold, white, equilateral cross in the center.
Three horizontal stripes: red on top, white in the middle, and blue on the bottom.
Blue and white horizontal stripes with a white cross on a blue square in the top-left corner.
Three vertical stripes: green, white, and red, with an eagle and snake emblem in the center of the white stripe.
Three horizontal stripes: light blue, white, and light blue, with a yellow sun in the center.
A blue field with the Union Jack in the top-left corner and white stars including the Southern Cross.

medium.description: Green field with a yellow diamond and a blue globe with stars and a banner.
Red bands on the sides with a white center featuring a red maple leaf.
Red and yellow horizontal stripes with a coat of arms toward the hoist side.
A blue field with a yellow Nordic cross extending to the edges.
A red field with a blue Nordic cross outlined in white.
Horizontal stripes of saffron, white, and green with a navy blue wheel in the center.
Green Y-shape with bands of black, yellow, white, red, and blue.
A red field with a white star and crescent slightly off-center.
Three horizontal stripes: white on top, blue in the middle, and red on the bottom.
Red field with one large yellow star and four smaller stars in the top-left corner.
Three vertical stripes: black, yellow, and red.
Three vertical stripes: green, white, and orange.
Two horizontal stripes: white on top and red on the bottom.

hard.description: Only non-rectangular flag: two stacked triangles with a white sun and moon on a red field bordered in blue.
Diagonal yellow and orange with a white dragon in the center holding jewels.
Green, black, and yellow horizontal stripes with white fimbriations and a red triangle containing a star, book, hoe, and rifle.
Three horizontal stripes: blue on top, black in the middle, and white on the bottom.
A light blue field with a golden sun and soaring eagle in the center and a national ornamental pattern near the hoist.
Divided diagonally by a black band with yellow edges from bottom-left to top-right, with green and blue triangles.
Oblique bands of blue, yellow, red, white, and green radiating from the bottom-left corner.
Three vertical stripes: ultramarine, gold, and ultramarine, with a black trident head in the center.
A red field with a yellow sun in the center containing a stylized depiction of a tunduk (yurt roof).
Diagonally divided black and red field with white stars on the black half and a yellow bird-of-paradise on the red half.
A maroon field with a golden lion holding a sword and yellow and green vertical stripes at the hoist.
A light blue field with a horizontal black stripe bordered by white in the center.
A red field with a black, blue, and white triangle at the hoist and a rising golden sun at the top of the black area.
